about_the_game:
Milrendir is said to be brimming with riches long forgotten, left behind after the Dwarves that inhabited were forced out of the area by something sinister.
You (and a friend? co-op) are the latest to attempt to plunder the depths of the stronghold, in your quest for untold wealth. What you were not told is that many before you have tried, and none have returned.
In the depths of Milrendir something evil stirs. Do you have what it takes to destroy the evil within, claim the riches that lie beneath and more importantly be return with the prize?

Procedural Dungeons

Smash Dungeon is a new game from indie developer Plastic Cow Games taking inspiration from arcade classics to bring you procedurally generated dungeon mayhem creating dungeons with traps, secret areas, shops and special rooms.

Hordes of Enemies

There are many enemies to defeat in the dungeons beneath Milrendir, from shambling skeletons, charging metal hulks, exploding skull tossing crawlers, farting pigs and more - and that's before you reach the bosses.

Relics

To help aid you in your quest for riches there are many Relics scattered throughout the dungeon such as a Dragons Tooth granting a chance to ignite an enemy, Orbs of protection, and many different types of Armour to help bolster your feeble stats and many more. Who knows you may even find some Legendary Relics.

Power ups

To further help in your quest some enemies drop single use items such as bombs that can kill enemies or uncover secret areas, phoenix flames to incinerate your foe, extra health and more. Not to mention Weapon Boosts which can provide chain lightning, projectile slash effects and repel giving you that little extra to clear a room.

Runes

Runes are sometimes granted when you clear a room of enemies. These give the ability to passively improve your character from areas like attack & defense to defying death itself and more.

Help is at hand

But if it all seems a bit too much to handle don't worry, play with a friend in couch co-op.
Fight through the hordes of enemies, dispatching them in a variety of ways such as Melee, bombs, Phoenix flames, chain lightning, towers and more.

Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB NVIDIA GeForce 9800 / ATI Radeon HD 2600 XT
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Smash Dungeon is a brutal, dark, intense, action rogue-like. Hack and slash your way through the procedurally generated dungeons on your own or in couch co-op, using a combination of armor & weapons upgrades, passive items and power-ups to kill everything in your path to claim the riches below.
supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
